mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (family_id, name, email, password, family_role, profile_image_name, calorie_goal) VALUES (#{familyId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{familyRole}, #{profileImageName}, #{calorieGoal})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, family_role = #{familyRole}, profile_image_name = #{profileImageName}, calorie_goal = #{calorieGoal}, is_admin = #{isAdmin} WHERE id = #{id}
